QuestData.Title: Ar'tor, Son of Oronok
QuestData.Description: My youngest son, Ar'tor, left to search Illidari Point - far to the southwest, nestled between Legion Hold and Wildhammer Stronghold.$B$BWhile Ar'tor is a hunter of remarkable skill and an expert tracker, I fear that he may be in over his head this time. Illidari Point is the proving grounds for Illidan's demons. These are demons that left the Burning Legion to join the Betrayer!$B$BTravel to Illidari Point and find Ar'tor, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Ar'tor, Son of Oronok at Illidari Point in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: Ar'tor's body lies limp, suspended in mid-air. You have no idea how long he has been dead but your heart aches for Oronok.$B$BPerhaps you should try and get him down and take his corpse back to his father.
